channel.title: Help please =(
channel.description: i read a guide on how to recolor items and i don't know if the color replaces the item or if it makes another item but i think it just changes the item as u don't put in a new id for it =( if someone could tell me how to add a recolored item instead of changing that would help also =) thanks (i got a list of colors if that helps any)
